title: Bug in champion select (6.14)
body:
While I am picking a champion in champ select, all the text goes down and I can't do anything with it. Sometimes I can't even pick a champion due to that bug. I have already lost a lot of LP so I hope that the problem will be solved as soon as possible. 
I don't cry for the lost LP, just want to play without obstacles.
Thank you for the settlement
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

>all the text goes down

What exactly do you mean by this?

I'm no wrenchman, but from what I've seen this is usually a client side thing, especially if it's after a new patch likely something got corrupted in your client files. I'd try repairing your client, and if that doesn't work a fresh install of league probs. Otherwise wait until a wrenchman replies to you here with some other possible solutions.
